===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|y=irr|おととい|acc=3|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おととい|hhira=をととひ}}<br/>
{{ja-noun|おとつい}}<br/>
{{ja-noun|いっさくじつ|hidex=いっさくじつ}} (''formal'')
<!-- rewrite to おととい -->

# the [[day before yesterday]]

====Usage notes====
The kanji used here for the readings {{lang|ja|おととい}} and {{lang|ja|おとつい}} are [[熟字訓|jukujikun]], with no regard for reading. The hiragana spelling ({{ja-l|おととい}}) is preferred over the kanji spelling {{lang|ja|一昨日}}, which is rare.
====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|一昨昨日|さきおととい}}: 3 days ago
* {{ja-r|一昨々日|さきおととい}}: 3 days ago
